thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 4 of 176
thread.title: Cathy Smith

author: Cathy Smith
title: Cathy Smith
text: We have been members of Trusted Housesitters for 2 years now - and really don't know what we would have done without them! Every time we look for a sitter, we are spoilt for choice. The site is really easy to use and the new message area is an improvement on previous. The live online help is really good as well if you do need it. All in all a great service.
